Content-Type: text/plain;
	charset="iso-8859-1"

Plintissa was now fading......she held out her blaster to aim at a Predacon=
, she couldn't tell who it was, she couldn't see right......but she dropped=
 the gun......she didn't have the strength to un-impale herself from the br=
oken off autogun....she just did not understand why Suukie, a good robot, w=
ould hurt her lie this.....she heard something on the other side of the wal=
l.....and whisperd to whomever it was.. "i won't give up no matter what you=
 do!..." the one on the other side coughed up mech fluid....and said: "how =
am i in a position to hurt you?..." the voice was weak like her own, and th=
at's when she remembeed the voice..it was Sinesis, the bot she had battled =
earlier.......she realized that when Suukie had impaled her, he jammed the =
autogun even farther through the base, and then impaled Sinesis on it from =
the other side!.....she looked down at the crack between her and Sinesis' s=
ide of the wall......blood was oozing through...and she was sure that he wa=
s also seeing her blood at the moment also.........she hated being stuck to=
 a wall opposite of a predacon, but it didn't matter right now, she was too=
 weak to do anything......
